snippet: Both vice-presidential candidates delivered some lacerating blows, but Representative Paul D. Ryan at times seemed disconcerted by the sheer blowhard intensity Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. brought to the night.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley The TV Watch column evaluates the vice-presidential debate, arguing that Joseph R Biden Jr often got the better of Paul Ryan with withering ripostes and sheer intensity.
lead_paragraph: Both vice-presidential candidates delivered some lacerating blows, but Representative Paul D. Ryan at times seemed disconcerted by the sheer blowhard intensity Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. brought to the night.

headline.seo: Biden Takes Off Gloves in Vice-Presidential Debate
headline.main: Night of Withering Ripostes, Mostly Delivered by Biden
headline.print_headline: Night of Withering Ripostes, Mostly Delivered by Biden
